doc:
Brendan Coyle https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brendan_Coyle 0 Brendan Coyle (born David Coyle; 2 December 1962) is a British actor. He won the Olivier Award for Best Performance in a Supporting Role for The Weir in 1999. He also played Nicholas Higgins in the miniseries North South, Robert Timmins in the first three series of Lark Rise to Candleford, and more recently Mr Bates, the valet, in Downton Abbey, which earned him a nomination for a Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Supporting Actor in a Drama Series and a BAFTA nomination for Best Supporting Actor Brendan_Coyle ( born David_Coyle ; 2_December_1962 ) is a_British_actor . He won the_Olivier_Award for Best Performance in a_Supporting_Role for The_Weir in 1999 . He also played Nicholas_Higgins in the_miniseries_North_ , Robert_Timmins in the_first_three_series of Lark_Rise to Candleford , and more_recently Mr_Bates , the_valet , in Downton_Abbey , which
